q:
Suppose you want to register a secondary system to replicate your SAP HANA Database. You select a replication mode to conduct to occur during the system replication operation. The asynchronous mode is selected after comparing all the four types of replication modes that are available for the system replication technique:

  1. It guarantees zero data loss.
  2. It offers no transaction delays.
  3. It offers the shortest transaction delays.
  4. It maintains consistency between two nodes.
  5. It maintains data consistency throughout the process.

In SAP HANA, data in column stores can undergo the following two-stage compression.

  1. The first stage is a basic type which is a dictionary compression.
  2. The second stage is an advanced compression method that you can apply to the data compressed by dictionary compression.

If you are required to apply the compression techniques to the main storage and on a single predominant column value, then which of the following compression techniques must be used?

You are working on the SAP HANA system. Suddenly, the database is locked down and the system goes into the lockdown mode. You are unable to use the system. Which of the following reasons must have caused the lockdown: 

  1. You have deleted all the existing license keys on your system.
  2. The hardware key changes while using a temporary license key.
  3. You have an enforced license key type and you exceed the permitted memory usage on it.
  4. The temporary license key which stays valid only for 90 days from the SAP HANA database installation is expired.

You are trying to deploy the SAP HANA Quick Start template. However, your deployment failed by displaying the CREATE_FAILED error the following error message on the screen. What is the cause of the occurrence of this error:

Error message

WaitCondition timed out. Received 0 conditions when expecting 1

a.option: You are deploying your instance in a dedicated host but the automatic recovery option is enabled.
You are using a custom storage configuration file but it is either inaccessible or empty.
No or slow Internet access is causing delays when downloading SAP HANA software.
You have already enabled AWS configuration in your target region.

q:
In SAP HANA, the JSON object expressions are one of the types of SQL expressions and are primarily used to generate a JSON object. A typical JSON object consists of two elements, Key and Value. Which of the following pairs of symbols must be used to enclose the JSON object:

  1. ( )
  2. { }
  3. [ ]
  4. | |
  5. < >

You want to activate an Audit policy in the SAP HANA system. You must select an appropriate audit trail target to activate the policy. If you use the audit trail only for test purpose in a non-production environment, then which of the following types of audit trails must be used:

  1. Syslog (default)
  2. Database Table
  3. CSV text

You have installed an enforced license key by using SAP HANA Studio to use SAP HANA Database. After a few days, the consumption of the SAP HANA system exceeds the licensed amount of memory. Which of the following represents the effect of this type of condition on the operation of SAP HANA?

a.option: The HANA system gets restarted again.
It shuts down the HANA system.
A new license key is provided in order to operate on the HANA system.

q: You are assigned a task to replicate data. You can either replicate real-time data or perform scheduled-based replication from SAP and non-SAP sources. You can complete the task by setting up the replication on the console via the command line or by using SAP HANA studio. Which of the following replication methods must be used to accomplish the task?

The following list depicts some standard supported object privileges that are primarily used to allow access on SAP HANA Database such as tables, views, and schemas. Which of the following options from the list supports all kinds of database objects:

List

  1. ALTER
  2. DEBUG
  3. DELETE
  4. DROP
  5. INDEX
Which of the following security-related features must be used to prevent the modification of certain system properties by tenant database administrators in the Multitenant SAP HANA Database?
You are trying to recover a database in the SAP HANA system. If the recovery failed due to insufficient data area and log area, then which of the following recovery options must be used?

Which of the following features of SAP HANA satisfies the following characteristics:

  • Collects information about the health, usage, and performance of all components of your HANA database on a regular basis
  • Provides warnings if any of the components exceeds the set threshold value

You used Computer Management Corporation to create an OLAP connection to connect to SAP HANA Database. Which of the following types of authentication must be used if you do not want the HANA system to ask for the user name and password repeatedly while using the same connection:

  1. SSO
  2. Prompt
  3. Predefined

In SAP HANA, triggers are stored programs that are called automatically in response to a particular type of event. Which of the following types of events is not supported for execution in SQL triggers:

  1. A database operation 
  2. A database control (DCL) statement
  3. A database definition (DDL) statement
  4. A database manipulation (DML) statement

A subquery always returns either a zero or a single value when used as an SQL expression in SAP HANA. Which of the following rules must be followed for the use of a subquery: 

  1. An ORDER BY clause can be used in a subquery.
  2. Subqueries must be enclosed within parentheses.
  3. The BETWEEN operator can be used within a subquery.
  4. A subquery can be immediately enclosed in a set function.
  5. A subquery can have multiple columns in the SELECT clause.

You are writing an SQL statement in SAP HANA Studio SQL Console to create a table. You want to store a large amount of ASCII characters in a column. Which of the following categories of SQL data types must be used for storing the characters?

In SAP HANA, the Time subtype Attribute View allows you to add Time Dimension to Data Foundation. Which of the following work panes must be used to view the attributes of all the tables added to the Data Foundation tool?

You have assigned different rights to different users on various components of the view in SAP HANA. Which of the following options must be used to limit the access of users on HANA information views?
You have successfully imported SAP-delivered business content on SAP HANA. The activation of the content fails. Which of the following reasons must have caused the failure?

a.option: SYS REPO has no access to the user
Necessary package privilege is not assigned
Create Scenario privilege is missing on the user

q: In SAP HANA, if the vendor's information is set, then which of the following fields is mandatory while creating a delivery unit?
Which of the following types of imports or exports is allowed to be performed from SAP HANA Studio?
Which of the following privileges or restrictions must be used to restrict access to SAP HANA information models based on user groups?

Which of the following authorization privileges must be required for activation of views while working with SAP HANA:

  1. Analytic privilege 
  2. Package privilege
  3. SQL privilege

In SAP HANA DB, which of the following tools provides you a simple but efficient interface to independently ask and answer business questions on the fly from the stored data:

  1. SAP BO Explorer
  2. SAP BO Web Intelligence 
  3. SAP Crystal Reports

You must ensure that the users are able to modify existing reports and, if required, create new ad hoc reports while working with SAP HANA. Which of the following tools must be used to allow the users to have this flexibility of modifications and allows them to retrieve more detail-oriented information?

In SAP HANA, which of the following ways allows the customer to dynamically display the description column in the language that the end user is using:

  1. Use a text join and program the SPRAS column
  2. Manually change at the user end is not possible
  3. Program at the application layer

In SAP HANA, which of the following statements about local modeling is correct:

  1. You can have multiple tables in a data foundation in an analytical view.
  2. You can create a Calculation view as the Dimension model.
Which of the following operations is not supported if you are working with SAP HANA?

Which of the following mandatory rules is mandatory for the Attribute View data for SAP HANA SP07:

  1. One key attribute and at least one attribute
  2. Two key attributes
  3. Two attributes and multiple key attributes
In SAP HANA, which of the following parameters is not supported in the Attribute view?
Your customer requires real-time replication. Which of the following allows you to select the tables to be replicated to SAP HANA?

a.option: In transaction LTR in SAP Landscape Transformation (SLT)
In the Import dialog of the Quick Launch of SAP HANA studio
In transaction SAP ERP Tables and Indexes Monitor (DB02)
In the Data Provisioning dialog of SAP HANA studio

q:
Which of the following tools will you use to transform data before retrieving it into SAP HANA:

  1. SAP BODS 
  2. SAP SLT 
  3. SAP DXC

In SAP HANA, which of the following statements is correct about the local import feature:

  1. You can append data into an existing table with data by using the local import feature.
  2. You cannot change the structure of a new table during the importing process by using the local import feature.

Which of the following tools must be used to implement CSV files into SAP HANA Database:

  1. SAP BODS
  2. In-built feature from SAP HANA Studio
  3. CTL method

In SAP HANA, which of the following recovery methods must be implemented while working with SAP HANA 1.0:

  1. Point-in-time recovery
  2. Recover to last committed state
  3. Restore to the state of a previous DB back-up

Which of the following configurations must be used to ensure high availability in SAP HANA:

  1. Scale-Up 
  2. Scale-Out 
  3. Scale-In
In SAP HANA, which of the following components includes actual data stores and engines for processing input data?

Which of the following situations requires the requirement of recovery of an SAP HANA Database:

  1. A disk in the log area is unusable.
  2. A disk in the data area is unusable.
  3. You want to create a copy of the SAP HANA Database.
  4. The SAP HANA database needs to be reset to its state at a particular point in time.

The following figure depicts the different phases of high availability in the SAP HANA system:

Figure:

The high availability feature provides fault tolerance and the ability to resume system operations after an outage with minimum business loss. However, to achieve high availability in the system, which of the following extra components must be added as a backup for other functions:

Extra components:

  1. Network Redundancy
  2. Software Redundancy
  3. Persistence Redundancy
  4. Hardware Redundancy

You can configure Single-sign-on in the SAP HANA system to allow the users to access the HANA system directly by logging in to the system from an initial authentication on the client end. Which of the following methods is not supported by the HANA system for the configuration of SSO?

Which of the following components is an important part of SAP HANA:

  1. Index Server 
  2. Pre Processor
  3. Name Server
In SAP HANA, which of the following official documents will you refer to advise your clients and customers on the latest hardware configurations from different hardware partners?
Which of the following main tables is created when the basic view of a business partner is created in SAP S/4 HANA?
